Package io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NanoleafCallback<T>
    The main callback interface for asynchronous requests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Aurora
    The Aurora class is one of the three main concrete classes for creating a NanoleafDevice.
    Canvas
    The Canvas class is one of the three main concrete classes for creating a NanoleafDevice.
    Color
    Convenience class for storing colors.
    CustomEffect
    Custom effects allow for highly customizable animation to be designed.
    CustomEffect.Builder
    The custom effect builder makes it easy to programmatically design custom effects.
    Effect
    The Effect class is a major class for representing effects.
    Frame
    The Frame class is an immutable storage for frames that make up an animation.
    NanoleafDevice
    The primary class in the API.
    NanoleafDeviceMeta
    An object for storing information related to a Nanoleaf device.
    NanoleafGroup
    This class simplifies the interface for controlling multiple devices together.
    Palette
    The Palette class is a small convenience class for a collection of colors.
    Palette.Builder  
    Panel
    A storage class for panels from a Nanoleaf Device.
    Plugin
    Plugins define how plugin effect are rendered.
    PluginEffect
    Plugin effects are the most common type of effect.
    PluginMeta
    A simple convenience class for storing detailed plugin metadata retrieved from a NanoleafDevice.
    Shapes
    The Shapes class is one of the three main concrete classes for creating a NanoleafDevice.
    ShapeType
    A simple storage class for storing the shape type of a panel.
    StaticEffect
    Static effects are a subset of custom effects; they are effects with no motion.
    StaticEffect.Builder
    The custom effect builder makes it easy to programmatically design static effects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JSONParserException  
    NanoleafException
    A NanoleafException indicates that a request to a Nanoleaf device failed.
